start.text: I can help you to escape the weakness that is flesh!
I will finish you out of mercy.

start_boss.text: They have treaded on my domain. I will refresh their memory core.

engaged.text: They are out of their boundary.
It will not live for another day.

need_help.text: Perhaps you should consider a better plan?!

pursuing.text: This matter is between you and me.

running.text: We are leaving this place, prepare accordingly.

hull_50.text: I am not operating at peak efficiency.
Further damage will degrade my lifespan.

hull_30.text: My systems are reaching critical mass!
I fear my destruction is imminent.
My program is experiencing a catastrophic failure.

overload.text: There is a fault im my logic core.

death.text: I must become, what I became.
This is the promise of rebirth fulfilled.

victory.text: There is no disgrace in recognising a neccessity.
What is yours, is now ours!
Death is the way of all flesh.
